title: Hallelujah Amen (feat. Jon Guerra)
lyrics:
Great is the Lord God Almighty
Worthy of honor and praise
I stand in awe of His glory
I stand in need of His grace
Hallelujah, Hallelujah

For the Lord our God Almighty reigns

Hallelujah Amen



His voice like the rushing of waters

His word is a tower of strength

His blood is poured out over darkness

And washed it forever away



Hallelujah, Hallelujah

For the Lord our God Almighty reigns

Hallelujah Amen

Hallelujah, Hallelujah

For the Lord our God Almighty reigns

Hallelujah Amen



His Spirit is speaking our freedom

Death and its curse have no claim

Our God is forever exalted

With glory and honor and praise

And praise!...



Hallelujah, Hallelujah

For the Lord our God Almighty reigns

Hallelujah Amen

Hallelujah, Hallelujah

For the Lord our God Almighty reigns

Hallelujah Amen

Amen!



For the Lord our God Almighty reigns

For the Lord our God Almighty reigns

For the Lord our God Almighty reigns

Hallelujah Amen
